llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Regime 1 easing-growth path with a September 50bp cut and further reductions that compress real-rate differentials and soften the dollar, supporting AI-enabled growth and Tencent’s monetization momentum | Powell’s Jackson Hole bias cues and Tencent’s monetization momentum as leading indicators | 60% (GX057ADL7)(37UZC9X8I)

Up | 3–6 months | IPO-driven small-cap rotation lifting ACMR toward/beyond the $34.76 target as Russell 2000 valuation resets and IPO momentum | Watch IPO momentum, Russell 2000 rotation, and ACMR milestones | 40% (Q7VVGNSQE)(SK994CBWR)(C22MKA9VY)

Down | 3–6 months | Macro risk: if the September rate cut is delayed beyond Q3 or if export controls intensify, ACMR’s multiple could compress and the stock could underperform despite solid fundamentals | Watch CPI-driven rate-cut cadence and export-control developments plus ACMR revenue milestones | 25% (C22MKA9VY)(SK994CBWR)

Down | 6–12 months | Congo sanction stance and related supply-chain risks inject a higher risk premium into energy and metals, raising cross-asset volatility and potentially offsetting AI-driven tech upside | Watch Congo-mineral sanctions dynamics and energy/commodity price signals as the cross-asset risk catalyst | 20% (GX057ADL7)(J99EM2TPZ)
